title: Miley Cyrus says she's 'trying to heal' rapidly from Tonsillitis after she's hospitalized
text:
Miley Cyrus seemed upbeat Tuesday as she updated fans on her health as she's hospitalized battling Tonsillitis, while a prominent tattoo artist shared a new design he etched on the musical artist's arm.

The 26-year-old singer referenced Gorillapalooza, an upcoming Los Angeles benefit show put on by Ellen DeGeneres and Portia de Rossi's wildlife charity, The Ellen Fund.

'Trying to heal quick so I can make it to Gorillapalooza ... this weekeend!' the Slide Away artist wrote, tagging DeGeneres, de Rossi and Bruno Mars (who's slated to perform) into the post.

The latest: Miley Cyrus, 26, seemed upbeat Tuesday as she updated fans on her health as she's hospitalized battling Tonsillitis

In an accompanying shot, the Wrecking Ball singer was pictured in her hospital bed ion a hospital gown with multiple IVs hooked into her arm.

Cyrus, who was visited by her mom Tish in the hospital, asked for a boost from nearly 100 million followers in hopes of a swift recovery so she can make it to show.

'Send gooooood vibes my way!' the We Can't Stop singer said. 'Hoping the Rock star G*DS send me a boost of bad a** and help me kick this s*** to the curb where it belongs! We got gorillas to save!'

She also shared a shot on Tuesday in which she was posed with fellow artists Mike WiLL Made-It, French Montana and Future, who she collaborated with on her 2013 album Bangerz.

Inked: Famed tattoo artist Doctor Woo shared a shot on his Instagram page of a new design he applied to the inside of one of the singer's arms

Music-makers: Miley shared a shot on Tuesday in which she was posed with fellow artists Mike WiLL Made-It, French Montana and Future

'ICONS only! Loved co-writing #Bangerz with all these dudes!' she said. '@mikewillmadeit came on and produced the f*** out of this record! @future and I wrote songs like “Love Money Party” and “My darlin” together! Thank youuuuu for jumping on FU @frenchmontana.'

Also Tuesday, famed tattoo artist Doctor Woo shared a shot on his Instagram page of a new design he applied to the inside of one of the singer's arms.

'Ancient symbols found on rock walls with some woo twist for @mileycyrus,' Doctor Woo wrote, adding the hashtags, #hideawayatsuitex and #slimneedle.

New love: Miley shared a shot of Cody Simpson strumming on a silver guitar on Monday

Recovering: The Wrecking Ball singer previously shared this shot of herself amid the illness

Miley's hospital stint comes during her new romance with Australian musician Cody Simpson, 22, who was pictured by her bedside in an earlier clip on her Instagram Stories.

The Nashville native and Australian actor initially began dating from 2009, got engaged in 2012, broke up in 2013, and rekindled the romance around 2016.

The romance with Simpson comes amid a turbulent time in Miley's love life, following her split with husband Liam Hemsworth in August after about eight months of marriage.

Miley's romance with Kaitlynn Carter, the ex of reality star Brody Jenner, made news after the duo shared a social media shot in which they were together on a yacht in Lake Como, Italy.
description: In an accompanying shot, the Wrecking Ball singer was pictured in her hospital bed ion a hospital gown with multiple IVs hooked into her arm.
